text: Donatos Pizza is a Columbus-style pizza restaurant chain. It is headquartered in Gahanna, Ohio, United States. It is a pizza delivery franchisor with nearly 200 locations in thirteen states, the majority of them being in Ohio. It is also served at several venue outlets, including Ohio Stadium and formerly at the Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum. Category:American fast food restaurants Category:1963 establishments in the United States
title: Donatos Pizza
